instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message:
Hello it's me again, yes I have a lot of problems this week ^^

I have an 820-00165 board which has been restored. About 10 power rails were repaired ...

Now it starts and blocks when starting. First 3min on screen 1 and then infinitely on screen 2 ...

The problem persists during Mac OS installation, it persists in safe mode, it persists in smc bypass mode ...

Thanks for your help :-)

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message:
You can have CPU, or RAM issue.
Supposedly accumulated crap under RAM chips, or CPU.
Try heating 15-20s to 1800-200 degrees.

Also try USB macOS, disconnecting internal SSD.

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message:
Ok i just heat up and boot without ssd it still hangs.
I didn't use any feed. Do you want me to put flux on and remove silicone from around CPU?

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message:
Of course, you need to use quality flux, not "chinese honey".
Do not exceed 200 degres; no need to melt the balls.

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message:
"About 10 power rails were repaired"
Sounds like heavy corrosion on this board.
Maybe more traces, or resistors damaged.

threads.title: Error : applekeystore operation failed
threads.message: Try booting on Linux LiveUSB. If it boots try to clean ME region.
